main event: An observer in Santee, California spotted a white object moving at an extremely high speed for 10 to 15 minutes on 7 October 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a pin at arm's length,The sighting lasted about 10 to 15 minutes and the object disappeared after 29 minutes,Two individuals alerted the observer about the sighting,The object's movement was noted as moving southwest to northeast,The report suggests the phenomenon may have been caused by ball lightning.
witness description: civilian observer and two individuals who pointed it out
